import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { AppBar, Avatar, Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardHeader, Divider, Icon, IconButton, Input, List, ListItem, ListItemText, Paper, Toolbar, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import {FuseAnimateGroup} from '@fuse'; import axios from 'axios'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; class TimelineTab extends Component { state = { activities: null, posts : null }; componentDidMount() { axios.get('/api/profile/timeline').then(res => { this.setState(res.data); }); } render() { const {activities, posts} = this.state; return (
photo person location_on
{posts && posts.map((post) => ( } action={ more_vert } title={( {post.user.name} {post.type === 'post' && "posted on your timeline"} {post.type === 'something' && "shared something with you"} {post.type === 'video' && "shared a video with you"} {post.type === 'article' && "shared an article with you"} )} subheader={post.time} /> {post.message && ( {post.message} )} {post.media && ( )} {post.article && (
{post.article.title} {post.article.subtitle} {post.article.excerpt}
)} {post.comments && post.comments.length > 0 && (
{post.comments.length} comments keyboard_arrow_down
{post.comments.map((comment) => (
{comment.user.name} {comment.time}
)} secondary={comment.message} />
Reply flag
))}
)}
) ) }
Latest Activity {activities && activities.map((activity) => ( {activity.user.name} {activity.message}
)} secondary={activity.time} /> ))} ); } } export default TimelineTab;
